translations: n.解剖，切开；解剖体；详细查究

sentences.sentence: During animal dissections, you need to wear masks to prevent infections.
sentences.translation: 动物解剖实验必须佩带口罩，以免发生生物污染。

sentences.sentence: At last, we cite an engineering example to carry integrated dissections.
sentences.translation: 最后举出工程实例进行综合分析。

sentences.sentence: The accuracy was 89.7% in 20 patients who had bilateral neck dissections.
sentences.translation: 在接受双侧颈淋巴清扫术的20名患者中其准确度为89.7%。
